jobTitle: Brand Designer to help create full Brand identity for new startup
jobDescription:
We are a development company who gets to work with a lot of investors and lenders.
At the moment we have an investment brochure that does not look nice or modern and therefore we need someone who can do the following:
- Come up with the brochure design whilst sticking to company-branded colors (logo attached)
- Work on compressing the text, to make sure some of the points and paragraphs are shortened down to an icon+few wording
- Have a good understanding of design fundamentals
- Rearrange the points in a clear and logical layout

If you this sounds like something you can handle, you are very welcome to get in touch with your pricing and lead times and we can discuss further.

jobTitle: Need a full stack web devoloper
jobDescription:
We are looking for a great JavaScript developer with experience in the range of 2 to 6 years, who is proficient with React.js. Your primary focus will be on developing user interface components and implementing them following well-known React.js workflows (such as Flux or Redux). You will ensure that these components and the overall application are robust and easy to maintain. You will coordinate with the rest of the team working on different layers of the infrastructure. Therefore, a commitment to collaborative problem solving, sophisticated design, and quality product is important.

We are hiring 3 ReactJS Developers. Candidates having experience of working on charts/graphs like d3.js, chart.js will have an added advantage.

Responsibilities

-Developing new user-facing features using React.js
-Building reusable components and front-end libraries for future use
-Translating designs and wireframes into high-quality code
-Optimizing components for maximum performance across a vast array of web-capable devices and browsers

jobTitle: Hiring for IT/Tech to work in our Technology and Security Department
jobDescription:
I am trying to develop a custom pipeline for a Supervised Machine Learning problem.
Most part of the code is already developed. However, am getting an error on BaseEstimator & TransformerMixin.

I need help in solving this problem and build the E2E pipeline.
Need any freelancer who has experience in building custom Machine Learning pipelines & should have good experience with OOP using Python.

It is hardly 1-2 hours of the job as I have already developed 95% of the code.

Later may need help in future developments based on performance.

jobTitle: Email Marketing Strategist Needed
jobDescription:
We are an Animation and Video Explainer Production Company looking for a a freelancer to help us create strong, long-term relationships with clients, market our brand and services , increase seo, drive traffic to our website and socials and create brand awareness.

We care about our clients and the solutions we can deliver through the myriad of benefits that animated video explainers bring to marketing, advertising and promoting a product, service or business.

If you have to skills to deliver what we need, feel free to apply!

This is a potential long term contracted position.

Simone

jobTitle: Data science instructor
jobDescription:
As a Data Scientist, you will evaluate and improve LogicPlum's products. You will collaborate with a multi-disciplinary team of scientists and analysts on a wide range of problems. This position will bring scientific rigor and statistical methods to the challenges of product creation, development, and improvement with an appreciation for the behaviors of the end-user.
LogicPlum is and always will be an artificial intelligence company. We hire people with a broad set of technical skills who are ready to take on some of technology's most significant challenges and make a substantial impact on the businesses it supports. At LogicPlum, data scientists not only revolutionize practicality of solutions, they routinely work on the scalability of solutions, a variety of data problems, and entirely new methods of solving problems with our platforms. From tabular data to image data, text data to clustering, anomaly detection to time-series, LogicPlum Data Scientists are changing the world one technological achievement after another.
Responsibilities
• Work with large, complex data sets. Solve difficult, non-routine analysis problems, applying advanced analytical methods as needed. Conduct analysis that includes data gathering and requirements specification, processing, analysis, ongoing deliverables, and presentations.
• Build and prototype analysis pipelines iteratively to provide insights at scale. Develop comprehensive knowledge of LogicPlum data structures and metrics, advocating for changes where needed for product development.
• Interact cross-functionally, making business recommendations (e.g., cost-benefit, forecasting, experiment analysis) with effective presentations of findings at multiple levels of stakeholders through visual displays of quantitative information.
• Research and develop analysis, forecasting, and optimization methods to improve the quality of LogicPlum's user-facing products.

jobTitle: Data science instructor

This position will bring scientific rigor and statistical methods to the challenges of product creation, development, and improvement with an appreciation for the behaviors of the end-user.
LogicPlum is and always will be an artificial intelligence company. We hire people with a broad set of technical skills who are ready to take on some of technology's most significant challenges and make a substantial impact on the businesses it supports. At LogicPlum, data scientists not only revolutionize practicality of solutions, they routinely work on the scalability of solutions, a variety of data problems, and entirely new methods of solving problems with our platforms. From tabular data to image data, text data to clustering, anomaly detection to time-series, LogicPlum Data Scientists are changing the world one technological achievement after another.
Responsibilities
• Work with large, complex data sets. Solve difficult, non-routine analysis problems, applying advanced analytical methods as needed. Conduct analysis that includes data gathering and requirements specification, processing, analysis, ongoing deliverables, and presentations.

• Interact cross-functionally, making business recommendations (e.g., cost-benefit, forecasting, experiment analysis) with effective presentations of findings at multiple levels of stakeholders through visual displays of quantitative information.
• Research and develop analysis, forecasting, and optimization methods to improve the quality of LogicPlum's user-facing products.
